issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `increaseApproval(address,uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description: A reachable exception (opcode 0xfe) has been detected. This can be caused by type errors, division by zero, out-of-bounds array access, or assert violations. This is acceptable in most situations. Note however that `assert()` should only be used to check invariants. Use `require()` for regular input checking.

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function requestHangingDividends(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location

issues.description:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `transferFrom(address,address,uint256)`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.
issues.title: Integer Underflow
